wikipedia_page.main: John Joseph Edwards (23 February 1924 – 17 October 1978) was an English footballer who played as an inside-forward for Nottingham Forest, Southampton and Notts County during the 1940s and 1950s.

response: *Jack Edwards (footballer, born 1867) (1867–1960), English footballer for Preston North End
